This transmittal reports the correction of the previous       designation of the International Field Artillery Tactical       Data System (IFATDS) from non-MDE to MDE. Because reporting       the quantity of MDE items is required, this transmittal also       reports the quantity of eighteen (18) for the IFATDS. The       following non-MDE…
